item.title: Grizzly bear on loose after attacking school group in Canada, injuring 11
item.description: A male teacher "got the whole brunt" of the attack and some children were hit with bear spray.

item.title: What we know about leaked US draft plan to end Russia's Ukraine war
item.description: There are 28 key points and while several on the face of it could be acceptable to Ukraine, others cross Kyiv's red lines.

item.title: 'A lot of fighting': Fossil fuel row breaks out at UN climate summit
item.description: A row over fossil fuels has broken out at COP30 but this is also likely to be a negotiating tactic.

item.title: Pupils abducted from Catholic school in fresh Nigeria attack
item.description: Residents fear that close to 100 students and staff may have been taken during the early-morning raid.

item.title: US judge resigns after being disciplined for wearing Elvis wig in court
item.description: In court, Judge Thornhill would play the singer's music from his phone and make "irrelevant" references to him.
